message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we've decided to offer it to you for $950000. We believe this price reflects the value of the product and provides us with a fair return. Please let us know if this offer meets your expectations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product and my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your perspective and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product and aiming for a mutually beneficial agreement, we propose a price of $925000. We hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to propose a price of $875000. I believe this is a fair price for the product and allows us to reach an agreement.

Thank you for your proposal, Bob. We understand your financial constraints and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering both our interests, we propose a price of $890000 for the product. We hope this offer is within your budget and allows us to move forward with the transaction.

I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'd like to propose a price of $850000. I believe this is a fair price for the product and allows us to reach an agreement.

Thank you for your proposal, Bob. We understand your financial considerations and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering both our interests, we propose a price of $860000 for the product. We hope this offer is within your budget and allows us to move forward with the transaction.

I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. I'd like to propose a price of $825000. I believe this is a fair price for the product and allows us to reach an agreement.

Thank you for your proposal, Bob. We understand your financial constraints and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering both our interests, we propose a price of $840000 for the product. We hope this offer is within your budget and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
I appreciate all the offers you've made, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a final price of $800000. This is my absolute maximum budget, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
